name: DeleteUserEmail
description:
Delete an email for the authenticated GitHub user.

Use this tool to delete an email address associated with the authenticated user's GitHub account. This action requires user authentication and appropriate permissions.

parameters.name: email_details
parameters.description: JSON object containing the details of the email to be deleted for the authenticated user.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the GitHub API.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
